WHOS DAB</strong></p><p style="margin: 0px; margin-left: 8px;"><span style="background-color: initial; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"><br></span></p><p style="margin: 0px; margin-left: 8px;"><span style="background-color: initial; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">- <b>is&nbsp;</b></span><span style="background-color: transparent;"><b>a brokering platform that mediates&nbsp;</b></span><b style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">WHOS data</b></p><p style="margin: 0px; margin-left: 8px;"><b style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">&nbsp;publishing system (WHOS Node</b><b style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">) and&nbsp;</b><b style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">WHOS&nbsp;</b><b style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">data&nbsp;</b></p><p style="margin: 0px; margin-left: 8px;"><b style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">consumer systems</b><b style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">. I</b><b style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">t also mediates between WHOS</b></p><p style="margin: 0px; margin-left: 8px;"><b style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">&nbsp;Nodes and WIS&nbsp;</b><b style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">global services (Catche, catalogue</b></p><p style="margin: 0px; margin-left: 8px;"><b style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">&nbsp;and broker).</b></p><p style="margin: 0px; margin-left: 8px;"><span style="background-color: transparent;"><b>- enables interoperability&nbsp;</b></span><b style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">across different&nbsp;</b></p><p style="margin: 0px; margin-left: 8px;"><b style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">systems&nbsp;</b><b style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">and facilitates the discovery and access&nbsp;</b></p><p style="margin: 0px; margin-left: 8px;"><b style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">of hydrological data&nbsp;</b><b style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">at various scales.</b></p><p style="margin: 0px; margin-left: 8px;"><b style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">- also acts as a WIS Node for data publication</b></p><p style="margin: 0px; margin-left: 8px;"><b style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"><br></b></p><p style="margin: 0px; margin-left: 8px;"><b style="background-color: transparent; Data Policy: core and recommended, mandatory</p><p style="margin: 0px; margin-left: 8px;">2.&nbsp;<span style="background-color: initial;">Curation/data quality checking: Data provider or within WHOS?</span></p><p style="margin: 0px; margin-left: 8px;">3. Scales: Regional, National, transboundary</p><p style="margin: 0px; margin-left: 8px;">5.&nbsp;<span style="background-color: initial;">Scalability, d</span><span style="background-color: initial;">ata volumes, t</span><span style="background-color: initial;">ime resolution, remote sensing etc</span></p><p style="margin: 0px; margin-left: 8px;">6. WHOS more findable, can schema.org be used</p><p style="margin: 0px; margin-left: 8px;">10. <b><font color="#0f662f">S<span style="background-color: initial;">olidify the/focus on architecture with historical/near realtime</span></font></b></p><p style="margin: 0px; margin-left: 8px;"><b><span style="background-color: initial;"><font color="#000033">11.
